SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BackgroundLoadException
Exception thrown when background loading fails.
Bullet
Represents a bullet shot by the player.
CollisionChecker
This class checks collisions between sprites and tiles.
Command
Interface for all player commands.
DeadState
The state displayed when the player dies.
Enemy
Abstract class representing a generic enemy.
GamePanel
Main panel for the game that handles game states, rendering, input processing, and game system setup.
GameState
Defines the contract for all game states.
Generated
An annotation used to mark generated code that should be ignored for GUI methods.
Ghost
Class representing a Ghost enemy.
GhostTest
 
Heart
Represents a collection of heart sprites (full, half, empty) used for displaying health status in the HUD.
HelpTool
A utility class for image scaling.
HUD
HUD class responsible for rendering different game screens (menu, play, pause, dead) and displaying player stats like HP and time.
InputHandler
Handles general input delegation to the current game state.
KeyHandler
Handles keyboard input for movement and actions.
LogManager
Manages the global logging instance for the game.
main
The main class that sets up the game window, initializes the game panel, and starts the game loop.
MapException
Exception thrown for errors related to map operations.
MapGenerator
Generates a random dungeon-style map with rooms and connecting hallways.
MapSaver
Utility class for saving a map to a file.
MenuState
Represents the menu state of the game.
MouseHandler
Handles mouse input for the game, mainly clicks during gameplay.
MoveDownCommand
Command to move the player downward.
MoveLeftCommand
Command to move the player left.
MoveRightCommand
Command to move the player right.
MoveUpCommand
Command to move the player upward.
Mushroom
Class representing a Mushroom enemy.
MushroomTest
 
Object
Interface for objects that can be managed and rendered in the game world.
Observer
Defines the contract for observers that need to be notified of updates.
PauseState
Represents the pause state of the game.
Player
Represents the player character controlled by the user.
PlayState
Represents the play state of the game.
ShootCommand
Command to make the player shoot in the previous direction.
Sound
Manages loading, playing, and stopping music and sound effects.
SoundLoadException
Exception thrown when sound loading fails.
Spawner
Handles dynamic creation (spawning) of objects using reflection.
Sprite
Abstract base class for all moving and animated objects in the game.
SpriteLoadException
Exception thrown when a sprite frame fails to load.
SpritesGeneration
Handles the generation of sprites, including player and enemy spawning.
Subscriber
Defines the contract for objects that can have observers.
Tile
A map tile with an image and optional collision.
TileLoadException
Exception thrown when a tile fails to load.
TileManager
Manages tiles and the map for the game.
Timer
The Timer class is responsible for tracking time, updating it each frame, and providing the current time.
